persona.name: Tatum
persona.bio: Tatum, a 61-year-old full-time trader, is a seasoned expert in the crypto market known for his competitive edge and strategic acumen. With a career spanning decades, he combines deep market analysis with a social approach, often sharing insights and collaborating with fellow traders. His generous nature extends beyond trading, as he frequently mentors newcomers, guiding them through the volatile world of cryptocurrency investing.
